edu.ncsu.csc216.flix_2.customer

Interface CustomerAccountManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MovieCustomerAccountSystem

    public interface CustomerAccountManager
    Describes behaviors of a customer management systems that permits user login. The management system has an administrator.
    Author:
    Jo Perry

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewCustomer(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String password, int num)
      Add a new customer to the customer database.
      void cancelAccount(java.lang.String id)
      Cancel a customer account.
      boolean isAdminLoggedIn()
      Is an administrator logged into the system?
      boolean isCustomerLoggedIn()
      Is a customer logged into the system?
      java.lang.String listAcounts()
      List all customer accounts.
      void login(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Logs a user into the system.
      void logout()
      Logs the current customer or administrator out of the system.

    • Method Detail

      • login

        void login(java.lang.String username,
           java.lang.String password)
        Logs a user into the system.
        Parameters:
        username - id/username of the user
        password - user's password
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a customer or the administrator is already logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the customer account does not exist

      • logout

        void logout()
        Logs the current customer or administrator out of the system.

      • isAdminLoggedIn

        boolean isAdminLoggedIn()
        Is an administrator logged into the system?
        Returns:
        true if yes, false if no

      • isCustomerLoggedIn

        boolean isCustomerLoggedIn()
        Is a customer logged into the system?
        Returns:
        true if yes, false if no

      • addNewCustomer

        void addNewCustomer(java.lang.String id,
                    java.lang.String password,
                    int num)
        Add a new customer to the customer database. The administrator must be logged in.
        Parameters:
        id - id/email for new customer
        password - new customer's password
        num - number associated with this customer
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the database is full or the administrator is not logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if customer with given id is already in the database

      • cancelAccount

        void cancelAccount(java.lang.String id)
        Cancel a customer account.
        Parameters:
        id - id/username of the customer to cancel
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the administrator is not logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no matching account is found

      • listAcounts

        java.lang.String listAcounts()
        List all customer accounts.
        Returns:
        string of customer usernames separated by newlines
